definition: ability to write/writing skill/written/in written form
pen/pencil/writing brush/to write or compose/the strokes of Chinese characters/classifier for sums of money, deals/CL:支[zhi1],枝[zhi1]
head/hair style/the top/end/beginning or end/a stub/remnant/chief/boss/side/aspect/first/leading/classifier for pigs or livestock/CL:個|个[ge4]
the palest ink is better than the best memory (idiom)
pinyin: hao3 ji4 xing4 bu4 ru2 lan4 bi3 tou2

sentences.english: It starts with writing or having an effective problem statement.
sentences.chinese: 它是從一個筆頭闡述或者陳述的有效問題開始的。

sentences.english: In the spear or written parts can be installed welding head.
sentences.chinese: 在槍頭或者筆頭部位可安裝焊接頭。

sentences.english: The teacher allowed us an hour for written work.
sentences.chinese: 教員給我們一小時做筆頭作業。

sentences.english: He neither taught us English grammar rules nor asked us to do lots of ritten exercises.
sentences.chinese: 他沒教我們語法，也沒讓我們做大量的筆頭練習。

sentences.english: It was less to him than breaking of a pencil's point.
sentences.chinese: 對他來說，這比折斷鉛筆頭還不重要。

sentences.english: Come writers and critics. Who prophesize with your pen.
sentences.chinese: 來吧，作家和批評家，那些善於玩弄你筆頭的人們。

sentences.english: He neither taught UsEngllsh grammar rules nor asked Us to do lots of written exercises.
sentences.chinese: 他沒教我們語法，也沒讓我們做大量的筆頭練習。

sentences.english: Both were about the size of a pencil eraser.
sentences.chinese: 兩個蜘蛛都有鉛筆頭橡皮的大小。

sentences.english: The tool will burn through the paper and leave a faint outline.
sentences.chinese: 筆頭會燒穿白紙，留下一個淺淺的輪廓。

sentences.english: Practice giving answers to a complete IELTS test using only one barrel of pencil points.
sentences.chinese: 要練習只用一管鉛筆頭答完雅思考試的所有試題。

sentences.english: The teachers failed me on the written composition.
sentences.chinese: 教師們評我的筆頭作文不及格。

sentences.english: She would sit there drawing with the pencil stub.
sentences.chinese: 她會坐在那兒用鉛筆頭畫畫。

sentences.english: He has thrown away the pencil stub.

definition: to glue to/to paste onto/to stick on/also written 粘貼|粘贴[zhan1 tie1]
the shaft of a pen or writing brush/pen-holder/pen
the tip of a writing brush/vigor of style in writing/stroke/touch
to decide/to determine/established practice/(dialect) firmly resolved (to do sth)
rarity/rare delicacy/foreign matter/alien body/the dead/ghost/monstrosity/alien life-form
